data.eml:eml: Akrokolioplax, a new genus of Southeast Asian labeonine fishes (Teleostei: Cyprinidae).

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article E Zhang, Maurice Kottelat (2006): Akrokolioplax, a new genus of Southeast Asian labeonine fishes (Teleostei: Cyprinidae). Zootaxa 1225: 21-30, URL: http://www.zoobank.org/urn:lsid:zoobank.org:pub:F1EE8A2C-1A31-4A02-AE61-9F33857A85EC
